org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal
Class BaseConversionMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.BaseMonitoringService
      org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal.BaseConversionMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitoringService, ConversionMonitor
@Singleton
public class BaseConversionMonitor
extends BaseMonitoringService
implements ConversionMonitor

Default monitor for Conversion objects.

Author:
Sergi Castro
